sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Commission on Equitable Public University Funding Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Commission on Equitable Public University Funding Act.

sections.heading: Findings.  The General Assembly finds all of the following:
sections.text: Findings. The General Assembly finds all of the following:

sections.heading: Commission on Equitable Public University Funding; purpose.
sections.text: Commission on Equitable Public University Funding; purpose.

sections.heading: Compliance. Notwithstanding any other law or provision to the contrary, all public institutions of higher education and State agencies regulating public institutions of higher education shall furnish such data and information to the Commission as the Commission deems necessary to fulfill the require
sections.text: Compliance. Notwithstanding any other law or provision to the contrary, all public institutions of higher education and State agencies regulating public institutions of higher education shall furnish such data and information to the Commission as the Commission deems necessary to fulfill the requirements of this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
